item.title: Aptevo Therapeutics Inc 10-K
item.description: Aptevo Therapeutics Inc, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 24, 2022 had 37913 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 574 instances product - 416 instances clinical - 366 instances agreement - 268 instances stock - 239 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
